alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Deerfield Beach, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Coral Springs, Pompano Beach, Boca Raton, Deerfield Beach, Delray Beach, Margate, Lighthouse Point, Lauderdale-By-The-Sea, Highland Beach, Coconut Creek, Oakland Park, Parkland, Wilton Manors, Hillsboro Beach, Sea Ranch Lakes, Boca Pointe, Boca Del Mar, Godfrey Road and Twin Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
